flawed_nl_solution:
30 x 1/5 = <<30*1/5=6>>6 students like Math.
30 x 1/3 = <<30*1/3=90/1>>90/1 students like English.
So, 6 + 90/1 = <<6+90/1=96>>96 students like either Math or English.
Thus, 30 - 96 = <<30-96=-66>>-66 students neither like Math nor English.
Since 1/7 of the remaining like Science, therefore -66 x 1/7 = <<-66*1/7=-66/7>>-66/7 students like Science.
Hence, -66 - -66/7 = <<-66--66/7=-396/7>>-396/7 students neither likes the 3 subjects.
#### -396/7

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 90/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
